# rtx_httpd (Resource)

Manages HTTP daemon (httpd) configuration on RTX routers. This is a singleton resource - only one instance should exist per router. The HTTPD service provides the web management interface for the router.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Allow HTTP management from any interface
resource "rtx_httpd" "web_management" {
  host = "any"
}

# Restrict HTTP management to LAN only
# resource "rtx_httpd" "secure_web" {
#   host         = "lan1"
#   proxy_access = true
# }
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `host` (String) Interface to listen on. Use 'any' for all interfaces, or specify an interface name (e.g., 'lan1', 'pp1', 'bridge1', 'tunnel1').

### Optional

- `proxy_access` (Boolean) Enable L2MS proxy access for HTTP. When enabled, allows proxy access via L2MS protocol.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Resource identifier. Always 'httpd' for this singleton resource.
